if x is less than y , increment b by 1
if a is greater than b , print Mishka and newline , terminate the program
lines.code: if ( a > b ) cout << " Mishka " << endl , exit ( 0 ) ;

lines.text: if b is greater than a , print Chris and newline , terminate the program
lines.code: if ( b > a ) cout << " Chris " << endl , exit ( 0 ) ;
